Nighlight/Windlord:

Nighlight was stunned by the hammer but she would be fine... while 
Lunekill or Rockseeker didn't shot her.

Windlord opened fire against Rockseeker.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> OOC: I'll manage Lunekill while Robo isn't here.
> 
> Bic:
> 
> AzureBlade: DON'T WORRY ABOUT THE OTHER ONE! IT'S MINE! I WILL 
SLAY 
> THE FIRST ONE WHO STEALS MY KILL!
> 
> He pauses, a bit surprised of what he just said.
> 
> AzureBlade: Finish the first one while he's down. They're 
extremely 
> powerful, so don't let that opportunity go away.
> 
> But already, Rockseeker was defrosting. He turned his heat sinks 
off 
> and his frame got very hot, very quick. He was slowly making his 
ice 
> prison melt. He mentally told his sister about his situation.
> 
> Lunekill was almost inside long range of the base. She powered 
three 
> fusion cannons and targeted the base. She only had to come inside 
the 
> range limit...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> > Ancient: Stopping in his search for the other enemy turns to 
> intercept Denzabar Yelling " Hey you beserker get back into the 
base 
> where it is safe."
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:nIGHLIGHT::
> > 
> > "DENZABAR!!!!"SCreamed the femme while she tried to caught his 
> > arm"STOP!!! WE SHOULD GO TO BASE!!!! THERE WE CAN BE MORE 
> USEFUL!!!!"
> >

hammer
